mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tasks (id, type, status, payload_json, result_json, error_message, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{type}, #{status}, #{payloadJson}, #{resultJson}, #{errorMessage}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, type, status, payload_json, result_json, error_message, created_at, updated_at FROM tasks WHERE status IN ('PENDING', 'RUNNING') ORDER BY CASE status WHEN 'RUNNING' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, created_at ASC LIMIT #{limit}
